description: Trump campaign insiders said the former president is “fired up” after his debate with President Joe Biden, which even top Democrats said was a disaster for the incumbent. “He is fired up, he’s on a mission,” adviser pollster John McLaughlin said of former President Donald Trump. “What a beatdown,” the co-founder of McLaughlin & Associates, […]
title: Trump ‘fired up, on a mission’ after debate victory

description: MSNBC host Joy Reid shared concerns she was hearing from “Obamaworld people” and Democratic campaign operatives following the CNN presidential debate in Atlanta. “I was on the phone throughout much of the debate with Obamaworld people, with Democrats, with people who are political operatives, and with campaign operatives. My phone really never stopped buzzing throughout. […]
title: Joy Reid: The debate reaction among Democratic operatives is ‘approaching panic’

description: President Joe Biden was ripped by CNN commentators following his disastrous performance in the first debate. They said the biggest issue in the election was abortion, and Biden could not give an answer on it. He failed to mention abortion in his closing statement, where many hoped he would attack former President Donald Trump’s rhetoric […]
title: Biden ripped for failing to answer on abortion

description: The first presidential debate lasted 90 minutes, but President Joe Biden had lost it within 10 minutes. He stumbled immediately, lost his train of thought, and fell silent. It was painful to watch and obvious that no matter how much preparation he had done, he was utterly incapable of stringing sentences together and making a […]
title: Debate disaster for Biden

description: Vice President Kamala Harris dodged questioning about President Joe Biden‘s poor debate performance against former President Donald Trump Thursday evening, instead trying to pivot to contrasting the two candidate’s policy stances. “First of all, what we saw tonight is the president making a very clear contrast with Donald Trump on all of the issues that […]
title: Kamala Harris tries to downplay Biden’s struggles during CNN debate

description: Former President Donald Trump went on the offensive in his first debate with President Joe Biden and attempted to connect the Democratic administration’s border policies directly to a wave of headlines on crime committed by illegal immigrants. “We are living right now in a rat’s nest. They’re killing our people in New York, in California, […]
title: Trump invokes ‘Biden migrant crime’ in debate border clash

description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom brushed off a question about President Joe Biden stepping aside from the Democratic ticket following Thursday night’s presidential debate, calling such speculation “unhelpful” and “unnecessary.” An MSNBC anchor noted that “panic has set in” among some in the party and among strategists following Biden’s lackluster debate appearance and asked Newsom if […]
title: Newsom brushes aside calls for Biden to step aside at head of presidential ticket

description: Joe Biden‘s handlers took no risks, whisking the president from the White House and all view of the public for nearly a week, bunkering down in Camp David to train the incumbent for his first debate against former President Donald Trump for the 2024 election. His campaign planned a staggering $50 million in ad buys […]
title: Biden’s debate meltdown cues Category Five panic among Democrats because they fear Kamala

description: Former President Donald Trump attempted to blunt President Joe Biden invoking the former president’s conviction in New York as the two sparred in their Thursday presidential debate. Trump, who last month became the first former president to be convicted of a felony in his hush money trial, was also the first candidate to reference the […]
title: Trump fends off ‘convicted felon’ label at first presidential debate

description: Any time you have to drop excuses before a debate is even over, it is safe to say you have lost. President Joe Biden’s team seems to think that was the case Thursday night. Before the debate was over, Biden’s team leaked that he had been dealing with a cold all week. Biden rasped his […]
title: The magic word for Biden’s debate performance is ‘old,’ not ‘cold’

description: The first presidential debate predictably had moments of tension between the two candidates that devolved into personal attacks, including one moment that had President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump in a lengthy exchange over who is a better golfer. The exchange began when CNN moderators asked the two candidates how they would quell […]
title: Age no handicap: Trump-Biden presidential debate devolves into who is better golfer

description: ATLANTA — “President Biden just looks and sounds old.” That was the immediate reaction from Charlie Comfort, an Iowa Democrat, just 14 minutes into the first debate between President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump of the 2024 general election. “Can you hear my alarm bells?” Comfort wrote. “So far, he just doesn’t meet the bar.” […]
title: Democrats sound ‘alarm bells’ after Biden’s debate performance

description: During tonight’s debate, President Joe Biden said that nobody wants to mess with America. He is wrong. Under his leadership, our international foes feel more confident to challenge and harm the United States. As Trump hammered throughout the debate, the pullout from Afghanistan was an international embarrassment. American citizens were left behind to face the […]
title: Biden doesn’t get it: Our foes are messing with us right now

description: President Joe Biden shows a continuous inability to tell the truth as he talks about immigration. Biden says, “My border is better than Trump left it.” As my colleague Tiana Lowe Doescher notes in a number-heavy fact check, the very claim is ludicrous. When Biden was pressed on the issue of terrorists going over our […]
title: Biden lies about the border again

description: The look of fear on President Joe Biden’s face on the debate stage tonight is palpable. Biden has said more with his silence than he has with his words tonight. He looks equal parts scared and weak. The mumbling and coughing is nothing compared to the way he looks at former President Donald Trump when […]
title: Biden looks terrified on the debate stage

description: President Joe Biden erroneously claimed no U.S. troops have died during his administration in Thursday night’s presidential debate. “I’m the only president this century that doesn’t have any, this decade, that not any troops dying anywhere in the world, like he did,” Biden claimed, which is false. More than 15 U.S. service members have been […]
title: Biden inaccurately claims no troops died during administration in Trump debate

description: The former chief of the school district police for Uvalde, Texas, was indicted over his actions during the Robb Elementary School shooting. Pete Arredondo was arrested on Thursday and charged with 10 felony counts of abandoning or endangering a child. His arrest is the culmination of two years of intense scrutiny toward the police response […]
title: Former Uvalde school police chief indicted on charges of child endangerment

description: The first general election debate of the 2024 season commenced Thursday evening in Atlanta between President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump, but viewers were surprised to hear the president struggle to speak with a hoarse voice and several coughs within the opening minutes of the debate. Pollster Frank Luntz shared how his focus […]
title: Debate viewers criticize Biden’s coughing and hoarse voice

description: President Joe Biden denied supporting late-term abortion and said he merely wanted to go back to the standard of Roe v. Wade during the first 2024 general election debate, but he has supported legislation that would go beyond Roe and allow for abortions late in pregnancy. Biden, when asked whether he would support any gestational […]
title: Debate fact check: Biden did back going beyond Roe and legal late-term abortion

description: After nonsensically claiming that Border Patrol endorsed his bid for the presidency, President Joe Biden lied during his first 2024 debate against former President Donald Trump that crossings along the southern border are down 40% since his successor left office. In reality, Border Patrol recorded just 78,000 crossings along the southern border when Biden took […]
title: Biden lies that border crossings are down when they’ve doubled since he took office

description: A group of Robert F. Kennedy Jr. supporters gathered outside the White House to protest his exclusion from CNN’s presidential debate between President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump. The protest began at 4 p.m. and teetered out shortly after 7 p.m. At its height, event organizer and Kennedy campaign Virginia field director Jason […]
title: RFK Jr. supporters protest outside White House over presidential debate exclusion

description: President Joe Biden began the first debate looking and sounding awful. Then he declared that “we finally beat Medicare.” Biden’s first abortion answer veered incoherently into a discussion of spousal rape. Just 15 minutes into the debate, Biden supporters online were panicking about his evident mental decline. The thing is, this shouldn’t be a surprise […]
title: Liberals panic about Biden’s decline

description: During their first debate of the general election, President Joe Biden accused former President Donald Trump of raising the deficit more than any other president, blasting his predecessor for accruing the “largest deficit of any president within a four-year period.” While CNN moderator Jake Tapper cited a decadelong estimate of total projected spending by the […]
title: Biden lies that Trump raised the deficit more than him during first 2024 debate

description: The first 2024 presidential debate between President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump will begin at 9 p.m. Eastern. The CNN debate in Atlanta will be moderated by the network’s Dana Bash and Jake Tapper. The 90-minute debate will include two commercial breaks, and there will be no studio audience. Both candidates’ microphones will […]
title: Watch presidential debate live: Joe Biden and Donald Trump debate in Atlanta
